name: Frame - Portals on Steroids (itch)
description:
Disclaimer: frame is an EARLY ACCESS game and in active development. The finished version is planned for sometime in 2022.

We all know and love portals. But frames are more than portals sticking to walls. Frames are objects in the middle of the room you can physically interact with. So toss and carry frames around and explore the mind bending world of moving portals in this logic based puzzler.

Features:

  • Carefully crafted levels, introducing the different game mechanics in a natural and "intuitive" manner
  • Frames that connect far away locations in space
  • These frames  are fully integrated into the physics-engine and momentum relative to frames is preserved even when the frames are moving
  • Combination with many other "portal-related" mechanics: change in size, change in gravity, frames of any size and number
  • 100% seamless transition between frames
